name: Northern Leasing
overview:
Northern Leasing was founded in 1991 and has been a driving force in the creation, growth, and maturation of the micro-ticket leasing industry. Through innovations in customer marketing, payment processing, and integrated systems operations, Northern Leasing has paved the way for the emergence of micro-ticket leasing as a valuable financing alternative for businesses across North America and overseas.

Northern Leasing is the leading provider of micro-ticket leasing services for small- and mid-sized business operators and is located in New York, NY. Northern Leasing offers micro-ticket leasing services to businesses seeking to spread the cost of utilizing credit card processing services over an extended period rather than paying the full cost of required equipment upfront.

Northern Leasing also provides leasing services for spreading the cost of other equipment and materials such as signage and other electronic hardware over similar terms.
